trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dandridge
There were no other sightings in Dandridge on or around November 10th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi saw a very shiny blimp shaped object during an earthquake. the object was moving slowly and had no wings, sound or vapor trail. it was higher than a helicopter but lower than a commercial airplane. it was not a blimp. after the earthquake the ufo disappeared. i did not get a picture but it looks exactly like the picture of the ufo from denver, co link: http:\\www.huffingtonpost.com\2012\11\09\ufos-over-denver-mystify-expert_n_2104402.html?ncid=edlinkusaolp00000003#postcomment
Summary: Blimp shaped UFO, very shiny silver, no wings vapor trail or noise
